metadata.description: The Hood assembles a gang of the deadliest Sapien super-criminals: Madame Masque, The Absorbing Man, Titania, The Wrecking Crew, Nitro, Constrictor, The Sandman, Crossbones and more! Their goal is simple: get rich and get away with it.
metadata.name: House of M: Masters of Evil, Vol. 1
